column1: Uchi////- service! Ok so... Isn't service supposed to suck when food is this high on the scale? It seems not. NO pretentiousness and in fact
column2: the most chill and happy staff I have ever seen (makes sense... EVERYONE dining is happy. You look around and EVERYONE is simply shocked and ecstatic). Sushi chefs are happy
column5: and simply perfect. Both times the server was FAR better then most places I have been... Ever.
